sentences.english: Only a narrow - minded academic would believe man has evolved from apes.
sentences.chinese: 只有心胸狹隘的學者纔會相信人類是進化自人猿。

sentences.english: Depending too much on it only leads to narrow-mindedness and prejudice.
sentences.chinese: 太過依賴它只會導致心胸狹隘和偏見。

sentences.english: Fear makes us narrow-minded and we tend to put down others.
sentences.chinese: 恐懼使我們心胸狹隘，我們經常會去羞辱其他人。
